title: FS:  T3 Turkey Reds - 3 lower grade, raw
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Turkey Reds - 3 lower grade, raw
posts.post_content:
Hello,
Here are 3 lower grade T3s - priced to sell.  Prices include shipping and insurance.

NOTES:

Ames - obvious wear on right border, no creases, no pinholes, beautiful color and focus, clean checklist back - SOLD

Bergen - creasing as shown, no pinholes, 1-75 checklist back, beautiful clean image - $95

Dygert - no pinholes, minimal creasing, nice image, clean Turkey Red ad-back - $80

Hofman - no creases or pinholes, aside from scrapes - very sharp image, clean checklist back - SOLD

Schulte - no pinholes, very minimal light creasing, clean checklist back, scratch on top border, great image, solid card - $85

Thanks!
